welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Centerton, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, delicious local cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northwest Arkansas Regional Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Northwest Arkansas Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'XNA Free Wifi' from the available networks.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rogers Airport is where all domestic and international flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rogers Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springdale Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Springdale Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal (Drake Field) Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
